content: i designed this festive blanket for west yorkshire spinners as a cal last year all the parts are now in one and videos showing how you can work the technique and the edging can be found on wys youtube channel https //www youtube com/@westyorkshirespinners/videos this pattern is written using uk terminology with us conversions given in brackets in abbreviation list this crochet blanket uses the overlay mosaic crochet technique **yarn** west yorkshire spinners retreat chunky roving a adore 552 6 x 100g b pure 010 4 x 100g 7 00mm crochet hook **measurements** width x length for finished blanket cm 82 x 127 in 32¼ x 50
